title: The pristine beaches of Miami
description: Miami has a plethora of beautiful beaches. Whether you like a small quiet place to relax, or a lively beach full of other people we have it! Go swimming, diving, boating, and fishing! There are plenty of things to do!

services.title: Equipment Provided
services.intro: We provide any equipment you would ever need on a beach day! From towels and sunscreen to snorkle equipment and surfboards!

services.title: Fishing
services.intro: Rent a boat, fishing rods, and bait to fish to your hearts desire!
lists: Boat with captain available for rent

services.title: Beach Activities
services.intro: We host a variety of non ocean based activities at the request of outr customers!

services.title: Food and Drink
services.intro: Our staff will deliver local food and drinks directly to you on the beach. No need to leave that pearly white sand!

packages.title: Glass bottom boat tour
packages.text: A trip to see the ocean bottom through the bottom of a boat

packages.title: Kayaking
packages.text: Kayak through the pristine waters around Miami
